text: a lot of people tell me they want to
travel but they're too scared to leave
home so the best travel advice I can
give to anyone is just two words long
the hardest part about traveling is to
start because we always tend to
overthink things so if you just go then
you are putting yourself in a position
to step out of your comfort zone to take
that initial leap of faith to book that
long flight and once you're on the road
you'll never look back I've never ever
heard someone say that they've regretted
traveling being spontaneous leads to new
adventures meeting new people trying new
foods and having out-of-body experiences
that's the beauty of travel the most fun
place on earth you may have noticed
recently I've been wearing these shirts
with a just go logo on it it's my new
merchandise that I'll be selling for
only two weeks starting right now if you
like this motto or you just support the
daily videos that I've been creating for
the last 18 months then the best way you
can give back is by purchasing one of
these cool new shirts to wear on your
next trip simply click the link below to
place your order you can choose your
size and color from black purple red
light blue or dark blue and it will be
shipped right away to your doorstep the
shirt is 1899 plus $4 shipping if you
live in the US or nine dollars if you
live in any other country as part of
this announcement I will be giving away
10 free shirts in the next 24 hours to
enter simply tag three friends who would
like this shirt and tell me why you're
gonna wear it when it first arrived all
winners will be randomly chosen in the
next 24 hours good luck and happy
travels I'm drew pinsky and if you like
my travel videos please click Subscribe
and join me as I plan to visit every
country in the world
